bioconda.name: sff2fastq
bioconda.summary: Extract 454 Genome Sequencer reads from a SFF file and convert them into a FASTQ formatted output

biocontainers.name: sff2fastq
biocontainers.summary: Extract 454 Genome Sequencer reads from a SFF file and convert them into a FASTQ formatted output

biotools.summary: The program extracts read information from a SFF file, produced by the 454 genome sequencer, and outputs the sequences and quality scores in a FASTQ format.
